thread.title: Prince joins Instagram, publishes dozens of posts
thread.title_full: Prince joins Instagram, publishes dozens of posts | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: Relaxnews
title: Prince joins Instagram, publishes dozens of posts
text:
Prince has opened a new Instagram account, and called it â€˜Princestagram.'
Within a few hours of launching the account , the artist amassed about 43,300 followers and has uploaded dozens of images that include concert photos, album and magazine covers.
Prince has had a love-hate relationship with social media over the last few years, having created then deleted profiles on platforms like Facebook,Twitter and YouTube.
This time, the move is seen as a way to promote his latest album "HitNRun," which was released on Tidal this month.
  A photo posted by PRINCESTAGRAM (@prince) on Oct 22, 2015 at 6:41pm PDT
